description: Ministry of Defence and Urban Development - Determination of the 12, 54 and 62 Division, 15 Brigades, 24 Units shall be Divisions, Brigades and units of the Regular Force - Determination of the 4 Units shall be units of the Volunteer Force - Determination to suppress of the Welioya and Yala/Hambanthota Area Headquarters and 3 Brigades of the Regular Force - Determination to suppress of the one unit of the Volunteer Force of the Sri Lanka Army
